parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The client token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the **request ID** as the **client token**. The **request ID** may be different for each request.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the destination-based route.

parameters.name: NextHop
parameters.description: The next hop of the destination-based route.

parameters.name: OverlayMode
parameters.description: The tunneling protocol. Set the value to **Ipsec**, which specifies the IPsec tunneling protocol.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the IPsec-VPN connection.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RouteDest
parameters.description: The destination CIDR block of the destination-based route.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPsec-VPN connection.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.description:
The weight of the destination-based route. Valid values:

*   **0**: a low priority
*   **100**: a high priority
